greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, A115361 * the diagonalized variant of A018819.
comment: Row sums = A018819 starting with offset 1; (1, 2, 2, 4, 4, 6, 6, 10, 10,...).
Sum of n-th row terms = rightmost term of next row.
formula: Let M = triangle A115361, and Q = the diagonalized variant of A018819 such
that (1, 1, 2, 2, 4, 4, 6, 6,...) = rightmost diagonal with the rest zeros.
Triangle A168261 = M*Q as infinite lower triangular matrices.
